page.title: 04Out of school clothes
page.content: When we get home from School we put on totally different clothes.When I get home from School,I change into Jeans and a tee-shirt, or sweat-shirt and trainers.We take off our uniform, because we like to keep it clean for the next day.If we go out we usually wear a jump-suit and flat soft shoes.For week days my mum usually wears a skirt and jacket or a split skirt and mint tee-shirt.For Church I usually wear a jump-suit or a white and pink skirt and a white jacket.After School,boys usually wear jeans trainers denim jackets and a tee-shirt.When they play on their B.M.X's they put on B.M.X gear which is a B.M.X tracksuit and pads for protection. by Julie Moynihan and Michelle Howse.
